question: What is the most commonly used plasticizer in the world?
ground_truth: Among all phthalate esters, di-(2-ethylhexyl) phthalate (DEHP) is the most commonly used plasticizer worldwide.
system_answer: DEHP (di(2-ethylhexyl) phthalate) is widely recognized as the most commonly used plasticizer globally, due to its effective properties and widespread application in various industries.
